pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'ggplot2' Extension for Plotting Unimodal Distributions // The 'ggdistribute' package is an extension for plotting posterior or other types of unimodal distributions that require overlaying information about a distribution's intervals. It makes use of the 'ggproto' system to extend 'ggplot2', providing additional "geoms", "stats", and "positions." The extensions integrate with existing 'ggplot2' layer elements.
